basic.description: This course covers techniques of definition and logical argument, sets and functions, propositional logic, introduction to graphs and relations, and  applications. Mathematics majors should take MGF 3301 instead of MAD 2104.
basic.subject: MAD
basic.title: Discrete Mathematics I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: MAC 2311 or COP 3014 and MAC 1140. Recommended prerequisite: MAC 2311.
